wikipedia_page.main: Murray Brodie (born 26 September 1950) is a Scottish former professional footballer who played as a midfielder, making over 400 career appearances.

response: In September 1970, Second Division Leicester City signed the player, in a deal which saw Murray Brodie and Jimmy Burt moving to Aldershot plus a reported fee of £30,000.Rothmans Football Yearbook 1971-72 Jopling made just three league appearances in four seasons while at Leicester.
